To ensure that a group of subscribers never receives a promotional email, Northern Trail Outfitters should:
• C. Configure Auto-Suppression list for the Commercial classification.
By configuring an Auto-Suppression list for the Commercial classification, you can ensure that the specified group of subscribers is automatically excluded from receiving any promotional emails. discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
B & C
Custom fonts are not recommended. The difference between web-safe fonts and web/custom fonts is very important. A web-safe font is a font that is installed on every computer. Examples include Arial, Comic Sans, Courier, Georgia, Tahoma, and Verdana. You can consider them a “safe bet” when rendering the text as you intended.

Web-safe fonts are the only fonts that work in the desktop Outlooks. Conversely, web fonts, also called custom fonts, are not widely supported; they work only in Apple Mail, iOS Mail, Samsung, Mail, Outlook for Mac, and Outlook App (Android) at the time of writing.

Most brand fonts are custom fonts. To use them, the font files must be hosted on a server somewhere. The most commonly used font file types are woff, woff2, ttf, and oft, though woff is most commonly used.
